game.name: The Archetype
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Trading Cards, Commentary available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Archetype is a psychological-horror where you'll be in control (or not) of Archty's psychological aspects, like Fear, Despair, Anxiety, Sadness, Jealousy, Anger, Aggression, Libido, Envy, Guilt, Depression and Solitude.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Archetype is a psychological-horror where you'll be in control (or not) of Archty's psychological aspects, like Fear, Despair, Anxiety, Sadness, Jealousy, Anger, Aggression, Libido, Envy, Guilt, Depression and Solitude.

reviewHighlights.text: [h2]The Archetype[/h2] Has a total of [b]5[/b] trading cards.
